Configuration.Name: Blacklight OPAC Search
Configuration.Author: Nooogon,Inc.; updated by Rick Silterra, John Cline, Matthew Connolly
Configuration.Description: Performs a Blacklight OPAC title search with option for a keyword search as well. Once on a results page, Import Info will copy the call number and location values.

Setting.name: OPACURL
Setting.Description: The URL for your Blacklight OPAC. (i.e. http://catalog.princeton.edu)
